{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Loan Officer",
  "description": "At TeamAce, we help businesses across different industries thrive. We work with businesses to create their desired change by getting the right people, designing bespoke business processes, leveraging data, applying insights and technology. We combine our expertise and take different bespoke approaches to solve different business challenges because we believe there is no one size fits all approach. This way, you keep your eyes on the price and thrive.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Loan Officer

Job Locations:&nbsp;Iyana Iba, Obalende, Ikorodu &amp; Ota - Lagos&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are currently seeking experienced professionals for a Portfolio Manager position with our team, and we believe your background and experience could make you an excellent fit.
	As a Loan Officer, you will report directly to a Team Manager, overseeing a large customer portfolio to ensure minimal risk and effective loan recovery.


Responsibilities
Your key responsibilities will include:


	Marketing financial products to potential clients.
	Conducting pre-loan assessments and preparing necessary loan documents.
	Monitoring repayments and managing loan recovery processes.
	Ensuring proper portfolio transfer upon exit; failure to do so may lead to prosecution.
	This role requires a high level of integrity, attention to detail, and the ability to work outdoors when necessary.


Requirements


	Education: A minimum of OND or HND in accounting, finance, or related fields.
	Prior experience as a Loan Officer with a Microfinance Bank/Outfit is required.
	Sales Experience: While not mandatory, sales experience or training is preferred.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 Monthly, commensurate with experience.",
  "datePosted": "2025-09-20",
  "validThrough": "2025-10-21",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "TeamAce"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",

      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "187678"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 75000,
      "maxValue": 150000,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Loan Officer Job at TeamAce Limited




        
    

        
        At TeamAce, we help businesses across different industries thrive. We work with businesses to create their desired change by getting the right people, designing bespoke business processes, leveraging data, applying insights and technology. We combine our expertise and take different bespoke approaches to solve different business challenges because we believe there is no one size fits all approach. This way, you keep your eyes on the price and thrive.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Loan Officer

Job Locations: Iyana Iba, Obalende, Ikorodu & Ota - Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are currently seeking experienced professionals for a Portfolio Manager position with our team, and we believe your background and experience could make you an excellent fit.
	As a Loan Officer, you will report directly to a Team Manager, overseeing a large customer portfolio to ensure minimal risk and effective loan recovery.


Responsibilities
Your key responsibilities will include:


	Marketing financial products to potential clients.
	Conducting pre-loan assessments and preparing necessary loan documents.
	Monitoring repayments and managing loan recovery processes.
	Ensuring proper portfolio transfer upon exit; failure to do so may lead to prosecution.
	This role requires a high level of integrity, attention to detail, and the ability to work outdoors when necessary.


Requirements


	Education: A minimum of OND or HND in accounting, finance, or related fields.
	Prior experience as a Loan Officer with a Microfinance Bank/Outfit is required.
	Sales Experience: While not mandatory, sales experience or training is preferred.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 Monthly, commensurate with experience.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Facility Manager",
  "description": "TeamAce Limited - Our client, a leading Beauty Brand, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Facility Manager

Job Locations:&nbsp;Ikoyi and Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As the Facility Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing the daily operations, maintenance, and safety of the company&rsquo;s beauty and wellness facilities.
	You will ensure all equipment, utilities, and spaces are functional, well-maintained, and aligned with the brand&rsquo;s premium service standards.


Responsibilities


	Oversee facility operations, maintenance, and repairs across multiple locations.
	Ensure compliance with health, safety, and environmental standards.
	Manage vendors, service providers, and facility-related budgets.
	Conduct regular inspections and implement preventive maintenance plans.


Requirements


	B.Sc./ HND qualification in Facility Management, Engineering, or related discipline.
	3 &ndash; 5 years of proven experience as a Facility Manager or similar role.
	Strong knowledge of building systems, maintenance, and vendor management.
	Excellent organizational, problem-solving, and communication skills.


Salary
Negotiable.",

  "validThrough": "2025-09-30",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",

Facility Manager Job at TeamAce Limited




        
    

        
        TeamAce Limited - Our client, a leading Beauty Brand, is recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Facility Manager

Job Locations: Ikoyi and Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As the Facility Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing the daily operations, maintenance, and safety of the company’s beauty and wellness facilities.
	You will ensure all equipment, utilities, and spaces are functional, well-maintained, and aligned with the brand’s premium service standards.


Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Oversee facility operations, maintenance, and repairs across multiple locations.
	Ensure compliance with health, safety, and environmental standards.
	Manage vendors, service providers, and facility-related budgets.
	Conduct regular inspections and implement preventive maintenance plans.


Requirements


	B.Sc./ HND qualification in Facility Management, Engineering, or related discipline.
	3 – 5 years of proven experience as a Facility Manager or similar role.
	Strong knowledge of building systems, maintenance, and vendor management.
	Excellent organizational, problem-solving, and communication skills.


Salary
Negotiable.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Civil Engineer",
  "description": "TeamAce Limited - Our client, a reputable real estate and construction company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Civil Engineer
Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As the Civil Engineer, you will be responsible for supervising and executing construction projects, ensuring quality standards, compliance, and timely delivery.
	You will manage site activities, coordinate with contractors, and oversee project resources to support successful real estate developments.


Responsibilities


	Plan, design, and supervise construction projects to ensure quality and safety standards
	Oversee site operations, contractors, and project timelines
	Prepare project reports, cost estimates, and technical documentation
	Ensure compliance with regulatory and environmental standards


Requirements


	B.Sc Degree / HND in Civil Engineering or related discipline
	Minimum of 5 years of proven experience in construction and project supervision
	Strong knowledge of construction processes, materials, and regulations
	Excellent problem-solving, leadership, and communication skills


Salary
N400,000 - N600,000 Monthly (Net)",

  "validThrough": "2025-10-17",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "TeamAce"
    
  },

Civil Engineer Job at TeamAce Limited




        
    

        
        TeamAce Limited - Our client, a reputable real estate and construction company, is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Civil Engineer
Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	As the Civil Engineer, you will be responsible for supervising and executing construction projects, ensuring quality standards, compliance, and timely delivery.
	You will manage site activities, coordinate with contractors, and oversee project resources to support successful real estate developments.


Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Plan, design, and supervise construction projects to ensure quality and safety standards
	Oversee site operations, contractors, and project timelines
	Prepare project reports, cost estimates, and technical documentation
	Ensure compliance with regulatory and environmental standards


Requirements


	B.Sc Degree / HND in Civil Engineering or related discipline
	Minimum of 5 years of proven experience in construction and project supervision
	Strong knowledge of construction processes, materials, and regulations
	Excellent problem-solving, leadership, and communication skills


Salary
N400,000 - N600,000 Monthly (Net)

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Business Development Executive",
  "description": "PWAN Group Limited is a Real Estate Networking and Marketing firm withits Headquarters in Puri Mall, Yakoya, Ajah, Lagos State. We are a leading real estate organization in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Ajah, Lekki - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Identify emerging real estate trends, new market segments, and competitive landscape insights.
	Source, qualify, and manage sales leads through networking, cold outreach, and referral programs.
	Develop tailored proposals and presentations; negotiate contracts; maintain strong post-sale relationships to encourage repeat business.
	Forge alliances with brokers, property developers, corporate clients, and other stakeholders to expand PWAN&rsquo;s market reach.
	Achieve or exceed monthly and quarterly sales inflow targets, and report on pipeline status to senior management.
	Partner with marketing to craft promotional campaigns, with operations to ensure seamless project delivery, and with finance to track invoicing and commissions.
	Maintain accurate records of client meetings, proposal status, and closed deals; prepare monthly performance reports.


Requirements


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Business, Marketing, Finance, or a related field.
	1-3 years of proven business development or sales experience, preferably in real estate.
	Demonstrable track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.
	Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills.
	Strong analytical mindset, with the ability to interpret market data and translate insights into actionable strategies.
	Self-starter who thrives in a fast-paced, target-driven environment.
	Proficiency with CRM tools (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot) and MS Office suite.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@pwangroup.com&nbsp;using &quot;BDE; (Your location)&quot; as the subject of the mail.",

  "validThrough": "2025-10-11",

  },

       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },

Business Development Executive Job at PWAN Group




        
    

        
        PWAN Group Limited is a Real Estate Networking and Marketing firm withits Headquarters in Puri Mall, Yakoya, Ajah, Lagos State. We are a leading real estate organization in Nigeria.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Executive

Job Location: Ajah, Lekki - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Identify emerging real estate trends, new market segments, and competitive landscape insights.
	Source, qualify, and manage sales leads through networking, cold outreach, and referral programs.
	Develop tailored proposals and presentations; negotiate contracts; maintain strong post-sale relationships to encourage repeat business.
	Forge alliances with brokers, property developers, corporate clients, and other stakeholders to expand PWAN’s market reach.
	Achieve or exceed monthly and quarterly sales inflow targets, and report on pipeline status to senior management.
	Partner with marketing to craft promotional campaigns, with operations to ensure seamless project delivery, and with finance to track invoicing and commissions.
	Maintain accurate records of client meetings, proposal status, and closed deals; prepare monthly performance reports.


Requirements


	Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, Finance, or a related field.
	1-3 years of proven business development or sales experience, preferably in real estate.
	Demonstrable track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets.
	Excellent communication, presentation, and negotiation skills.
	Strong analytical mindset, with the ability to interpret market data and translate insights into actionable strategies.
	Self-starter who thrives in a fast-paced, target-driven environment.
	Proficiency with CRM tools (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot) and MS Office suite.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@pwangroup.com using "BDE; (Your location)" as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
